"Rediah": "An ARKS Card is a special card with your personal profile on it."
"Other people can look at your ARKS Card to get an idea of what sort of person you are."
"Naturally, you can look at other people's ARKS Cards too."
"You can use ARKS Cards to find other ARKS with similar goals, hobbies and interests to yourself."
"It would mean a lot to me if you used them to make new friends."
"I'd like you to try making your own ARKS Card."
"After that, I want you to take a look at other people's ARKS Cards."
"If you aren't sure how to view and edit ARKS Cards, speak to me again."
